summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 15th Avenue Northeast, from East Pacific Street to East Northlake Avenue, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 3176 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
